name: AndroidPIT
overview:
AndroidPIT, the young Berlin based start-up, is now the largest independent Android platform globally, with an international community of over 1 million registered users. Founded in February 2009 AndroidPIT has wasted no time in growing quickly to provide its users – in eight different languages - with an exhaustive Android resource encompassing a regularly updated news feed, fair and unbiased application reviews, an active forum and – most importantly perhaps - their app center, one of the 5 largest of it’s kind globally. This success is reflected in its traffic figures, reaching an impressive 5,4 million unique users per month. AndroidPIT’s young and dynamic team of editors will continue to strive to bring it’s users the most up to date and exhaustive android resource, hoping to cement their reputation as the world’s leading Android website.

For more information, please visit: www.androidpit.com and follow AndroidPIT on Twitter @androidpitcom.
